Keywords: Excalibur , Generation X , Monster , Mystical , X-Men
Real Name: Jubilation Lee
Special Powers
EXCALIBUR, MYSTICAL PROTECTORS: [Mystics TA], but only triggers during range attacks. Jubilee has PROTECTED: [Mystics TA].
YOU'RE NOT A HUMAN BABY...: Running Shot, [Wing symbol], [Giant symbol]. Jubilee has PROTECTED: Outwit, Pulse Wave.
DRAGONFIRE: Modify range +3, Penetrating/Psychic Blast. // FREE: Remove all non-debris terrain markers within range from the map.
SHOGO'S TRANSFORMATION: FREE: Once per game for all friendly characters with this power, if it's your 5th turn or later -or- the map's name includes "Otherworld", turn Jubilee to click #7.

I wish that the transformation option was for an additional cost instead of being baked into the character's default cost... perhaps that was too complicated to be figured out?
